UCD SWIMMING CLUB

The best university
swimming club in Ireland

With two squads, and a new 50m Olympic size swimming pool under, the club has grown into success lead by head coach Earl McCarthy. UCD Swimming are defending champions of both Men's and Women's Intervarsity titles as well as the Best Overall Team for the last three years.

Learn More

  • History

    The club was founded on 27 May 1913, making the club more than a century old. Learn more about our history, our legacy, our present and our future.

  • News

    Read more about our press releases and media coverage for the club, often competing in both national and internationally.

  • Join us!

    Wether you are an elite swimming seeking for excelence, or a varsities swimmer looking for a university club to practice your favourite sport and socialize.

  • Squads!

    Learn about our two squads, our training schedules and aims, as well as from our swimmers results and records.
